subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Alcohol Abuse
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: Two players for the University of Georgia have been arrested on alcohol-related charges, days after the university’s athletic director Damon Evans resigned in the wake of a drunken driving arrest.
snippet: Two players for the University of Georgia have been arrested on alcohol-related charges, days after the university’s athletic director Damon Evans resigned in the wake of a drunken driving arrest.
